data.text: Drinking a lot of wine or other strong drinks causes people to start fighting;
Being afraid of a king when he is angry is like [SIM] being afraid of a lion when it growls/roars;
People respect those who stay away from disputes/arguments;
If a lazy man does not plow his fields at the right/proper time,
Just as it is difficult to bring up water from a deep well, it is difficult to know what people are thinking,
Many people proclaim that they can be trusted to do what they say that they will do,
If parents conduct their lives as they should,
A king who sits on his throne to judge people
There is no one [RHQ] who can truthfully say, “I do not know of any wrong things that I have done;
Yahweh detests people who use weights that are not right
Even children show by what they do whether they are good or not;
Two of the things that Yahweh has created for us
If you want to sleep all the time, you will become poor;
People look at things that they are about to buy, and in order to get it for a lower price sometimes they say, “◄It is no good/It is poor quality►,”
Gold and precious stones are valuable,
If you foolishly promise to a stranger that you will pay what he owes if he is unable to pay it [DOU],
People may think that food that they acquire by doing what is dishonest will taste very good,
When people give you good advice, if you do what they suggest, your plans will succeed;
Those who go around telling gossip are always telling secrets to others;
If someone curses his father or his mother,
If you very quickly take the property that your parents promise will be yours after they die,
Do not say, “I will do evil to those who do evil to me;”
Yahweh detests those who use dishonest scales
Yahweh is the one who has decided what will happen to us,
You should think carefully before you solemnly promise to dedicate something to God,
Wise kings find out [MET] which people have done what is wrong,
Our consciences are like lamps that Yahweh has given to us to enable us to know what we are thinking [MET];
Kings will continue to rule as long as they faithfully love their people and are loyal to them
We honor/admire young people because they are strong,
When we are beaten or whipped, it can cause us to quit doing what is evil in our lives;
